name: Haight-Ashbury Hotel
proximityToAttractions: Located in the heart of Haight-Ashbury, within walking distance to the iconic Golden Gate Park and Buena Vista Park
neighborhoodSafety: Safe neighborhood with regular police patrol and security cameras
accessibility: Easily accessible by public transportation with a bus stop just steps away
climateControl: Individual climate control in each room
recentReview: A fantastic hotel with great service and a unique hippie vibe. Loved staying here!
shuttleService: Complimentary shuttle service to popular attractions
ambianceAndDecor: Bohemian-inspired decor with vibrant colors and unique artwork
viewAndSurroundings: Some rooms offer views of the iconic Painted Ladies
